files.content:
ECU Firmware v2.1.4
Build: Production
Date: 2024-03-15
Target: Infotainment System

# ECU Configuration
DEBUG_MODE=0
LOG_LEVEL=INFO
CAN_INTERFACE=vcan0
DIAG_PORT=8080

# Network services
diag		8080/tcp	# Diagnostic service
infotainment	9090/tcp	# Infotainment service

#!/bin/sh
# ECU Startup Script
echo "Starting ECU services..."
/sbin/infotainment_service &
/sbin/diag_service &
echo "ECU ready"

Build Configuration:
- Compiler: aarch64-linux-gnu-gcc
- Optimization: -O2
- Debug symbols: stripped
- Features: CAN, UDS, OBD-II
